Example.Name: CAN_BasicMode_Tx
Example.Description: Nuvoton CAN BUS DRIVER DEMO,Receive a message by normal mode. +------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | About CAN sample code configure | +------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | The sample code provide a simple sample code for you study CAN | | Before execute it, please check description as below | | | | 1.CAN_TX and CAN_RX should be connected to your CAN transceiver | | 2.Using two module board and connect to the same CAN BUS | | 3.Check the terminal resistor of bus is connected | | 4.Using UART0 as print message port(Both of NUC1xx module boards) | | | | |--------| |-----------| CANBUS |-----------| |--------| | | | |------>| |<------->| |<------| | | | | |CAN_TX | CAN | CAN_H | CAN |CAN_TX | | | | | NUC4XX | |Transceiver| |Transceiver| | NUC4XX | | | |<------| |<------->| |------>| | | | |CAN_RX | | CAN_L | |CAN_RX | | | |--------| |-----------| |-----------| |--------| | | | | | | | | | | V V | | UART0 UART0 | |(print message) (print message)| +------------------------------------------------------------------------+
